Job Description: Netwalk GmbH is looking for Automotive Embedded Software Developers with experience in Security Software Development to work in innovative automotive projects in Germany.Responsibilities: Design and implementation of software for Security modules Define and implement relevant communication interfaces Configuration and Integration of Crypto Stack and HSM Planning and execution of software tests Ensure that requirements are met in terms of functionality, performance, qualityand timing Participate in the creation of specifications, reviews and approvals  Qualifications: University degree in Electrical/Electronic engineering, Computer Science orsimilar Several years of experience in the development of embedded systems in C Experience with Vector Software Integration packages and Vector tools Experience with Development of Automotive Security Software Basic Knowledge of AUTOSAR Good knowledge and Experience on Certificate Management, PKI infrastructure,Cryptographic algortihms, Secure boot and Secure update Good communication skills.Interested candidates please send updated CV to jobs@netwalk.de
UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Electrical, Electronics/Telecommunication, Automobile, Instrumentation, Computers
PG: Any Postgraduate in Any Specialization, Post Graduation Not Required, M.Tech in Computers, Electrical, Electronics/Telecommunication, Automobile
